trans-unit.source: A composite activity that contains a collection of event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade de composição que contém uma coleção de manipuladores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is typically used where a collection of events must be handled.
trans-unit.target: Ela é normalmente usada quando uma coleção de eventos deve ser tratada.

trans-unit.source: Each event is handled by one <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />, which is part of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Cada evento é manipulado por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />, que faz parte de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity holds a set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classes, for use by the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> atividade contém um conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classes para uso por associado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can only be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> atividade só pode ser associada um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> atividade é uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, o que significa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> atividade pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: The currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="childactivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="childactivity" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the <paramref name="childactivity" />.
trans-unit.target: As atividades do arquivo executável não contêm o <paramref name="childactivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.
Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento subscribed-to ocorre.
